casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Matthew James ROGERS. No. 52P01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Matthew James Rogers, Pro Se. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 13th day of February 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
